attributes.action: We want the government to reopen gyms on July 4th 2020
attributes.additional_details: Review this and re open gyms in July 4th 2020
attributes.background: The government deem it appropriate to reopen public houses on July 4th 2020 and for some inexplicable reason decide that gyms a place of health should not reopen. Gyms have undertaken refits to adhere to the government guidelines. Users not only use it for a healthy body but to help with the mind.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition gyms have been allowed to reopen. You can read the Government's announcement about the reopening of gyms here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-gyms-and-pools-to-reopen-safely
